name: SuperClean Pro 2000
description: The SuperClean Pro 2000 offers powerful suction and advanced filtration to keep your home spotless. Equipped with a high-efficiency HEPA filter, it captures allergens and fine dust particles, making it ideal for allergy sufferers. Its lightweight design and swivel steering make maneuvering around furniture effortless, while the large dustbin ensures fewer interruptions during cleaning.

name: EcoVac 3000
description: The EcoVac 3000 combines efficiency with eco-friendly technology. Featuring a low-energy motor and recyclable materials, it delivers strong suction power while minimizing environmental impact. The bagless design and easy-to-empty dust canister reduce waste, and the built-in UV light helps sanitize surfaces as you clean, providing a deeper clean for your home.

name: TurboClean X500
description: The TurboClean X500 is designed for those who demand top performance. Its turbo-charged motor delivers superior suction power, and the multi-surface brush roll effortlessly transitions from carpets to hardwood floors. With advanced cyclonic technology, it maintains peak performance and reduces dust clouding. The included pet hair attachment and washable filters make it perfect for homes with pets.
